Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
MuteToggle, GUIController
public class GameController extends Object implements GUIController, MuteToggle
This class is the controller of the game screen.

      public void updateGameView(GameView gameView, String nickname)
      This method is used to update the game with the new game view.
      Parameters:
      gameView - the new game view.
      nickname - of the client who will receive the game view.

      This method is used to load the character cards.
      Parameters:
      characterCardViews - the character cards to load.
      nickname - of the player that will receive the updated CharacterCard scene.

      This method is used to update the islands.
      Parameters:
      islandGroupViews - the islands to update.
      motherNatureIndex - the index of the mother nature.

    • updatePlayerControllers

      private void updatePlayerControllers(List<PlayerView> playerViews, Map<String,Integer> playerCoins)
      This method is used to update the player controllers.
      Parameters:
      playerViews - the player views to update.
      playerCoins - the coins of the players.

    • addPlayerController

      private void addPlayerController(PlayerController playerController, String nickname)
      This method is used to create the player view and add it to the grid.
      Parameters:
      playerController - the player controller to add.
      nickname - the nickname of the player.

    • processChooseCloud

      public void processChooseCloud(ChooseCloud message)
      This method set the action on the cloud button.
      Parameters:
      message - ChosenCloud message that contains a list of available clouds.

    • processChooseIsland

      public void processChooseIsland(ChooseIsland message)
      This method sets the action on island buttons when the player could select an island.
      Parameters:
      message - the ChooseIsland message that contains a set of available islands .

    • processMoveMotherNature

      public void processMoveMotherNature(MoveMotherNature message)
      This method sets the islands the player could choose during the moving mother nature phase.
      Parameters:
      message - the MoveMotherNature message that contains the max steps mother nature could take.

    • clearAllButtons

      public void clearAllButtons(String nickname)
      This method resets all the clickable buttons.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player associated with the view.

    • processMoveCardIsland

      public void processMoveCardIsland(Set<Integer> fromIndexes, Set<Integer> toIndexes)
      This method handle the move to island requests. It highlights the islands the player could move to. When the player chooses an island it sends a MovedStudent message to the server.
      Parameters:
      fromIndexes - a set of indexes that represents the available student colors on the character card.
      toIndexes - a set of indexes that represents the available island indexes.

    • processMoveCardHall

      public void processMoveCardHall(Set<Integer> fromIndexes)
      This method handles the move from a card to the hall. Highlights the colors of the students that could be moved. When the player chooses a student it sends a MovedStudent message to the server.
      Parameters:
      fromIndexes - a set of indexes that represents the available student colors on the character card.

    • processSwapCardEntrance

      public void processSwapCardEntrance(Set<Integer> cardIndexes, Set<Integer> toIndexes)
      This method handles the swap of students between card and entrance. Highlights the colors of the students that could be swapped and the students in the entrance. When the player chooses a student it sends a SwappedStudents message to the server.
      Parameters:
      cardIndexes - a set of indexes that represents the available student colors on the character card.
      toIndexes - a set of indexes that represents the available students on the entrance.

    • processSwapEntranceHall

      public void processSwapEntranceHall(Set<Integer> fromIndexes, Set<Integer> toIndexes)
      This method handles the swap of students between entrance and hall. Highlights the students that could be swapped. When the player chooses a student it sends a SwappedStudents message to the server.
      Parameters:
      fromIndexes - a set of indexes that represents the available students on the entrance.
      toIndexes - a set of indexes that represents the available student colors on the hall.

    • processMultiplePossibleMoves

      public void processMultiplePossibleMoves(Set<Integer> entranceIndexes, Set<Integer> islandIndexes, Set<Integer> entranceToHallIndexes)
      This method handles a multiple possible moves. It highlights the clickable buttons and , after the choice of the player, sends the move to the server.
      Parameters:
      entranceIndexes - a set of indexes that represents the available students on the entrance that can be moved to an island.
      islandIndexes - a set of indexes that represents the available island.
      entranceToHallIndexes - a set of indexes that represents the available students on the entrance that can be moved to the hall.

    • findActivatedCard

      private Integer findActivatedCard()
      Helper method that returns the activated character card.
      Returns:
      the index of the active character card.

    • processPlayAssistantCard

      public void processPlayAssistantCard(EnumSet<AssistantCard> availableCards)
      This method handles the request of playing a card. It shows the available cards.
      Parameters:
      availableCards - an enum set of available cards.

    • closeAssistantCardView

      public void closeAssistantCardView()
      This method close the Assistant Card View.

      private void clearCharacterButtons()
      Disables all the character card buttons.

      This method requests to show the waiting screen.

    • showWaiting

      private void showWaiting(int timer)
      Shows the waiting screen. The waiting screen has a countdown.
      Parameters:
      timer - the initial value of the countdown timer.
